A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Here's the long and the short of it\, Mark Hamill\, Carrie FIsher\, Harrison Ford and others are still alive. They were alive in real life and in the movie\, killing them off early in this and the last movie was a huge mistake by a terrible company\, Disney. Nobody wanted that\, and I felt it during the movie. Disney should be taken apart stick by stick until it's gone. Why would i go back to see the rest\, i really don't care what happens next.
